wikipedia_page.main: Charles James Hughes, J.P. (16 August 1853 – 31 July 1916) was an English footballer, referee, and co-founder of Northwich Victoria Football Club. He was a pioneer of the early English game, being included in the publication 'Association Football and the Men who made it'.

response: * Charles J. Hughes Jr. (1853–1911), U.S. Senator from Colorado
* Charles J. Hughes Jr. (1853–1911), Democratic U.S. Senator from Colorado
